content:
ProvisionApplicationTypeDescription Class

Definition

Describes an application type to be provisioned by using ProvisionApplicationAsync(ProvisionApplicationTypeDescription, TimeSpan, CancellationToken).

In this Article

public sealed class ProvisionApplicationTypeDescription
Inheritance
Object
ProvisionApplicationTypeDescription

Constructors

ProvisionApplicationTypeDescription(String)

Instantiates an instance of ProvisionApplicationTypeDescription.

Properties

Async

Gets or sets the flag indicating whether provisioning should occur asynchronously.
BuildPath

Gets the relative path to the application package in the image store specified during CopyApplicationPackage(String, String, String, TimeSpan).
